page.title: 08ENGINEERS UMBERLEIGH
page.content: MURCH BROS UMBERLEIGH-ENGINEERS Murch Bros sell and repair farm machinery and lawnmowers. Murch Bros was rebuilt 40 years in 1945 but the business was started in 1880 by William and Thomas Murch. William was a blacksmith and Thomas a carpenter. They have never had a fire. The biggest thing they have ever fixed is a reed comber that weighs 2 tons. 15 people work there. They've never had a strike and when the River Taw has flooded its reached them lots of times. They've been robbed once of lawnmowers and several little things. They open at 8am and shut at 5pm weekdays and 8am-12pm on Saturdays.
